notification.content:
"Blessing of the Mystic Mountain" Login Bonus!

The mines of the mystic mountain overflow with Mythril! To show our gratitude for everyone's efforts in restoring the records, we'll be giving a special Daily Login Bonus!

Receive 1 Mythril every day!
Available from 5:00 PM 7/13 PST (1:00 AM 7/14 UTC) until 4:59 PM 8/12 PST (12:59 AM 8/13 UTC)

Just log in each day to claim the Mythril!
notification.title: Blessing of the Mystic Mountain

notification.content:
Dark Armor (IV) and Mythgraven Blade (IV) have a major drop rate bonus! 5★ Dark Armor (IV) and 5★ Mythgraven Blade (IV) added to Relic Draw
Drop rate bonus lasts until 4:59 PM 7/19 PST (12:59 AM 7/20 UTC)!

Dark Armor (IV)
Type: Armor
Soul Break: Dark Cannon (Dark Knight Cecil)
Effect: Deal heavy damage to 1 target and damage self.

Mythgraven Blade (IV)
Type: Sword
Soul Break: Radiant Wings (Paladin Cecil)
Effect: Deal 3 consecutive holy attacks.

The Relic Synergy from FINAL FANTASY IV equipment will give your party a leg up during the ongoing The Light Against the Darkness event!
Unleash the Dark Cannon and Radiant Wings Soul Breaks to strike down powerful enemies!

FINAL FANTASY IV Shared Soul Break Equipment Added! 5★ Flame Sword (IV) and Wind Spear (IV) both have Shared Soul Breaks!

Flame Sword (IV)
Type: Sword
Soul Break: Bladestorm Flames
Effect: Deal physical fire damage to all targets.

Wind Spear (IV)
Type: Spear
Soul Break: Slowing Strike
Effect: Deal damage with a chance to Slow one target.


Drop Rate Bonus on 5★ FINAL FANTASY IV Equipment! Dark Helm (IV), Diamond Armor (IV), and Genji Shield (IV) all have a drop rate bonus!

Take advantage of Relic Synergies during the ongoing The Light Against the Darkness event!
notification.title: New Relic Draw Drops

notification.content:
Recruit Cecil! The Light Against the Darkness event launched at 5:00 PM 7/9 PST (1:00 AM 7/10 UTC).

Duration 5:00 PM 7/9 PST (1:00 AM 7/10 UTC) to 4:59 PM 7/19 PST (12:59 AM 7/20 UTC)

Rewards Welcome the Dark Knight Cecil and the Paladin Cecil into your ranks!
Find Cecil Memory Crystals for both versions of Cecil in the Elite Dungeon!
Get a Memory Crystal to break Cecil's level cap!

See Event Rules for more details.
notification.title: New Event Underway

notification.content:
The Marriage of Convenience event begins at 5:00 PM 7/15 PST (1:00 AM 7/16 UTC)!

The daughter of High Summoner Braska continues on her pilgrimage!
Will Tidus and her Guardians be able to save her from the fate that awaits?

FINAL FANTASY X characters and equipment outshine the rest in the Marriage of Convenience event.
Be prepared! Recruit new characters in Classic Dungeons and use Daily Dungeons to upgrade your party and abilities now!
notification.title: Marriage of Convenience Coming Soon!

notification.content:
Bonus Battles in The Light Against the Darkness! Bonus Battles have been added to the ongoing The Light Against the Darkness event!

Unlock Bonus Battles by completing all of the event Elite Dungeons.
Survive the gauntlet of boss battles to get the white magic ability Raise!


See Event Rules for more details.
notification.title: Bonus Battles Added

notification.content:
This is an important notice for players of SQUARE ENIX games on the iOS platform.

Apple has officially announced the release of its iOS 9 Beta. Please note that if you install the iOS 9 Beta on your device, SQUARE ENIX apps may encounter malfunctions such as performance errors or loss of data, or perhaps even fail to deliver in-game currency purchased with real money.

Since our apps are not compatible with the iOS 9 Beta at this time, we regret we are unable to provide customer support for any trouble arising from installation of this OS (including, but not limited to, data recovery or undelivered in-game currencies). Please be aware that SQUARE ENIX will not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, in any way for loss or damages of any kind incurred by installing or using the iOS 9 Beta with relation to SQUARE ENIX apps.

For further information, please also see Apple's "Frequently Asked Questions."
https://beta.apple.com/sp/en/betaprogram/faq
notification.title: Apple iOS 9 Beta Notice
